医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现 JUN 蛋白可以减缓前列腺癌的生长随着前列腺癌的进展，它变得越来越具有侵袭性并且可以转移。这种形式的肿瘤很难治疗，这反映在高死亡率上：在世界范围内，前列腺恶性疾病是男性癌症死亡的第二大常见原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/JUN- Protein-could-slow-prostate-cancer-growth-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/JUN- Protein-could-slow-prostate-cancer-growth-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0c5e97c-d735-418e-83ed-d9d4509fd01f Wed, 05 Jun 2024 08:12:00 -0400 JUN protein could slow prostate cancer growth, study finds
研究揭示了不宁腿综合症病因的遗传线索科学家们发现了不宁腿综合症病因的遗传线索，这种综合症在老年人中很常见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Study-uncovers-genic-clues-to-the-cause-of-restless-leg-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Study-uncovers-genic-clues-to-the-cause-of-restless-leg-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=891ad72f-c57d-4f95-87e4-53c9e8f328e8 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 07:43:42 -0400 Study uncovers genetic clues to the cause of restless leg syndrome
非营利组织的卫生工作者？新的竞业禁止合同禁令可能对您没有帮助许多医生和护士对联邦贸易委员会禁止在雇佣合同中使用竞业禁止协议的新规定感到高兴。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Health-worker-for-a-nonprofit-The-new-ban-on-noncompete-contracts-may-not-help-you.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Health-worker-for-a-nonprofit-The-new-ban-on-noncompete-contracts-may-not-help-you.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fc05bb2-9dfd-40a2-ad82-7e7d177c5a1f Wed, 05 Jun 2024 07:37:12 -0400 Health worker for a nonprofit? The new ban on noncompete contracts may not help you
大流行互联网补贴的结束威胁到美国农村地区的医疗保健生命线玛娜·布朗乔 (Myrna Broncho) 在摔断腿后意识到互联网连接是多么必要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/End-of-pandemic-internet-subsidies-threatens-a-health-care-lifeline-for-rural-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/End-of-pandemic-internet-subsidies-threatens-a-health-care-lifeline-for-rural-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7eb01cd1-8e9d-41e9-a3f3-eee24b94fad8 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 07:33:23 -0400 End of pandemic internet subsidies threatens a health care lifeline for rural America
加州成为最新一个尝试限制医疗保健支出的州加州医疗保健负担能力办公室在减缓医疗保健支出失控的计划中面临着艰巨的任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/California-becomes-latest-state-to-try-capping-health-care-spending.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/California-becomes-latest-state-to-try-capping-health-care-spending.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1afab1b-7226-47ca-b764-c1a26603785a Wed, 05 Jun 2024 07:29:56 -0400 California becomes latest state to try capping health care spending
眼球追踪措施可以帮助更快地做出正确的自闭症诊断研究人员在社区环境中进行临床评估时，研究了眼球追踪生物标记在区分自闭症儿童和非自闭症儿童方面的可靠性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Eye-tracking-measures-could-help-make-the-right-autism-diagnosis-sooner.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Eye-tracking-measures-could-help-make-the-right-autism-diagnosis-sooner.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1be3d223-2046-4ee8-aaa0-0d2967d55932 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 07:03:00 -0400 Eye-tracking measures could help make the right autism diagnosis sooner
坚持地中海饮食可以降低女性的死亡风险地中海饮食依从性与全因死亡风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Mediterranean-dietary-adherence-can-reduce-mortality-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Mediterranean-dietary-adherence-can-reduce-mortality-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1797e236-c124-4267-8043-74205408491f Wed, 05 Jun 2024 06:37:00 -0400 Mediterranean dietary adherence can reduce mortality risk in women
美国研究发现女孩月经开始得更早，而且月经规律的时间更长研究人员研究了月经开始、规律时间的时间趋势和不平等，以及生命早期体重指数作为中介的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/US-study-finds-girls-are-starting-their-periods-earlier-and-take-longer-to-become-regular.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/US-study-finds-girls-are-starting-their-periods-earlier-and-take-longer-to-become-regular.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3e3380c-4bdd-40ed-aa02-a0cc0be6292a Wed, 05 Jun 2024 06:35:00 -0400 US study finds girls are starting their periods earlier and taking longer to become regular
ePrep 和安捷伦宣布建立 ePrep® ONE 色谱样品制备工作站的新经销合作伙伴关系ePrep 很高兴地宣布与分析实验室技术平台的全球领导者安捷伦建立新的合作伙伴关系，以便在选定的地区分销 ePrep® ONE 工作站。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/ePrep-and-Agilent-announce-new-distribution-partnership-for-the-ePrepc2ae-ONE-chromatography-sample-preparation-workstation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/ePrep-and-Agilent-announce-new-distribution-partnership-for-the-ePrepc2ae-ONE-chromatography-sample-preparation-workstation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36ecc8df-49e2-4be0-a07e-79e1fcbac3ce Wed, 05 Jun 2024 05:55:00 -0400 ePrep and Agilent announce new distribution partnership for the ePrep® ONE chromatography sample preparation workstation
